Content: I recently purchased this 97 thundercat from some random guy on Facebook. Dude said the bike can start on starting fluid but definitely can’t. I’ve replaced the stator, pickup coil, CDI. I’ve checked all the fuses, and continuity on the wires at the coils. I’m getting 12v at the coil then when I turn the bike over it’ll drop down to 8 6 0 back up to 8 but I’m getting zero volts at the end of the spark wire. No idea what it could be and it’s irritating me to the fullest extent ðŸ˜­

Title: 97 Yamaha Yzf600R no spark desperately need help
